conversation.content:
Discern the intentions held in the provided expression. Extract the entities and insert them into the correct slots using the schema of intents and entities as a guide. Intents refer to topics and entities attributes. 

Output will be in json with matching topic IDs as keys and a subdictionary of attributes with attributeID:value pairs. 3. Do not consider an entity if it is not there when formulating the output. The instances cited are for illustrative purposes and do not cover all possibilities.

Text: "Download tax form HR1587"
